div.p: Group 2 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/DetectedIssue|5.0.0 to Extensions for Using Data Elements from FHIR R5 in FHIR R4

tr.td: Note that the target element context `DetectedIssue.status` is a modifier element, so this extension does not need to be defined as a modifier. Element `DetectedIssue.status` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `DetectedIssue.status` as `RelatedTo`, concept domain: `NotRelatedTo`, value domain: `NotRelatedTo`.
Element `DetectedIssue.category` has a context of DetectedIssue based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `DetectedIssue`.
Element `DetectedIssue.mitigation.note` has a context of DetectedIssue.mitigation based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `DetectedIssue`.
